DOC.brief_title: Trial Evaluate Effects German eCHECKUP TO GO Students
DOC.detailed_description: The effectivity eCHUG-D checked prospective randomized-controlled web-study . All student participate university inform PsSt-study . They agree informed consent take part study . A missing agreement lead exclusion . All subject get individual random login-code study participation . After random assignment ( intervention ( eCHUG-D ) vs. control group ) subject answer web-questionnaires alcohol consumption ( see outcome variable ) . Subjects intervention group request conduct eCHUG-D fill login-code end program . The 3-month 6-month follow-up contain similar question alcohol consumption alcohol related consequence . On 6-month follow-up additional question ask acceptance eCHUG-D ( intervention group ) acceptance study general ( control condition ) . Earlier study show effectiveness eCHUG US college sample . The primary endpoint study ist amount alcohol consume . We hypothesize eCHUG group show significantly low level alcohol intake control group
